titles: An impartial account of the Portsmouth disputation with some just reflections on Dr. Russel's pretended narrative : with an abrigdment of those discourses that were the innocent occasion of that disputation / by Samuel Chandler, William Leigh, Benjamin Robinson.
author: Chandler, Samuel.
Leigh, William.
Robinson, Benjamin, 1666-1724.
publisher: Printed for John Lawrence and Abraham Chandler, and are to be sold by A. Baldwin,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
